track_not_removed: ❌ Could not remove any track with specified index. ``{arg0}``
track_current_none: 🔈 Nothing is playing on this server.
track_error: ❌ Error occurred adding track to queue.
track_error_playlist: ❌ Error occurred adding playlist to queue.
track_error_no_track: ❌ No track/playlist found in provided url.
queue_info_no_index: ❌ Could not find any track with index ``{arg0}``.
queue_move_no_index: ❌ Could not find any track with index ``{arg0}``.
bot_not_voice: ❌ Bot is not connected to any voice channel.
bot_cannot_join: ❌ Bot is missing permission to join that voice channel.
user_not_voice: ❌ You must be in a voice channel to use that command.
user_not_same_voice: ❌ You must be in the same voice channel as the bot to use that command.
user_same_voice: ❌ You must be in the different voice channel to use that command.
user_not_server: ❌ That command is only available in a server.
